subject: Simsonn VAM Pro Set Power Supply
description_text:
Hello,

I'm a proud owner of Simsonn Pro Plus pedals and I'm very happy about them.
I'm thinking about purchasing a 3x VAM Pro Set but I have a small question
about the power supply. I live in France and I was wondering if the power
outlet was catered to the country of purchase (we use type-C power outlets)
or if it was the same for everyone ?

Thanks for your response
Best regards
-- 
Victor LABOUYRIE

conversations.body_text: Hi Victor Labouyrie,    We will provide the corresponding plug for the country of purchase. France will provide a European plug.
